name: Nordic Blaze
description:
The game was initially started as part of the LOWREZJAM 2020 which ran from the 1st to 17th August, 2020.

Since this game is currently not finished on time for submission to the jam,
i've decided to post this project to itch.io as a prototype and not
submit it to the jam.

The aim of the singleplayer game would be to take over all islands and use the gained resources to destroy the oppponents carrier and drone force.

There is no gameplay currently in the game in the version v.0_1preAlpha, basically
it's more a tech-demo. I'm currently deciding whether to pursue the project further or not but I would also like to review the technology used to create this first version.

Controls
The game is controlled using a mouse and keyboard combination. The vehicle driving
is done using WASD to move and turn, and the middle mouse button pressed pans the view of the carrier, the carrier turret and map.
